name: Robocity
description:
+++ WAR PINBALL IS OUT !!! +++
BRAND NEW PINBALL GAME WITH THREE UNIQUE TABLES FOR YOUR IPHONE AND RETINA. CHECK THE APP STORE NOW!

----

"ROBOCITY"

Published by Gameprom.
Developed by Dream-Craft.

Captain Hiz’s memories…
“Awful iron monsters trooped me round. Yesterday I ran out of all my food. I must force my way through them. I believe I will find all the necessary components and repair the ship. Bravery - that is what can save me!”

You are the captain Hiz, your ship crashed on an deserted and strange planet. It lacks a biological life form but is full of robots. You will undergo many severe trials and gain a number of courageous victories before you can leave this gloomy place. Giant robot soldiers are guarding their territory, blue-colour robots are wandering around the destroyed cities and killer robots are incredible ruthless to any biological life form.

Yes, your trials are definitely severe but you have support! In the planet rubles you may find various weapons and artifacts able to annihilate the iron army!

Have a good luck Captain!
